Package se.swedenconnect.signservice.signature.impl

Class DefaultSignatureHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • se.swedenconnect.signservice.core.AbstractSignServiceHandler
      • se.swedenconnect.signservice.signature.impl.DefaultSignatureHandler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    SignServiceHandler, SignatureHandler
    public class DefaultSignatureHandler
extends AbstractSignServiceHandler
implements SignatureHandler
    Default implementation of the SignatureHandler interface.

    • Constructor Detail

      • DefaultSignatureHandler

        public DefaultSignatureHandler​(@Nonnull
                               List<TBSDataProcessor> tbsDataProcessors)
        Constructor assigning the TBSDataProcessor instances to use. A default algorithm registry (AlgorithmRegistrySingleton.getInstance()) and signer provider (DefaultSignServiceSignerProvider) is used.
        Parameters:
        tbsDataProcessors - a list of TBS data processors

      • DefaultSignatureHandler

        public DefaultSignatureHandler​(@Nonnull
                               List<TBSDataProcessor> tbsDataProcessors,
                               @Nullable
                               se.swedenconnect.security.algorithms.AlgorithmRegistry algorithmRegistry)
        Constructor assigning the TBSDataProcessor instances to use and an algorithm registry. A default signer provider (DefaultSignServiceSignerProvider) is used.
        Parameters:
        tbsDataProcessors - a list of TBS data processors
        algorithmRegistry - algorithm registry

      • DefaultSignatureHandler

        public DefaultSignatureHandler​(@Nonnull
                               List<TBSDataProcessor> tbsDataProcessors,
                               @Nullable
                               se.swedenconnect.security.algorithms.AlgorithmRegistry algorithmRegistry,
                               @Nullable
                               SignServiceSignerProvider signServiceSignerProvider)
        Constructor.

        If algorithmRegistry is null, a default algorithm registry (AlgorithmRegistrySingleton.getInstance()) is used. If signServiceSignerProvider is null a default signer provider (DefaultSignServiceSignerProvider) is used.

        Parameters:
        tbsDataProcessors - a list of TBS data processors
        algorithmRegistry - algorithm registry
        signServiceSignerProvider - sign service signer provider
